name: 69 Hitomi Love
description:
69 Hitomi Love is an addicting puzzle game in the jigsaw genre. The elven blood goddess Hitomi is waiting for you to collect all the puzzle pieces and unlock the graphic reward. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow to have a good rest after work .

Features


  • 16 Levels with Full HD Artwork
  • Relaxing music
  • Meditative gameplay
  • 16 Achievements
  • The elven goddess is waiting for you!
